Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Adds "pregnancy outcome" to the list of protected classes
Summary: Adds "pregnancy outcome" to the list of protected classes.
LawCode: Amd §§292, 291, 295, 296 & 296-a, Exec L; amd §40-c, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the civil rights law, in relation to adding "pregnancy outcome" to the list of protected classes
